structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and amended as KRS 154.30-080, 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 178, sec. 21, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 21, effective March 23, 2007.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Requirement that minimal capital investment be made prior to the release of incremental revenues -- Escrow account -- Duties of office to monitor agreements, track revenues, and prepare reports for commission.
